refmeta.refmiscinfo: nfs-cp: copy files to/from an NFS share

refnamediv.refpurpose: Utility to copy files to/from and NFS server

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: nfs-cp is a utility to copy files to/from and NFS server.

Examples:
$ nfs-cp foo.c nfs://127.0.0.1/data/tmp/foo.c
$ nfs-cp nfs://127.0.0.1/data/tmp/foo.c bob.c
$ nfs-cp nfs://127.0.0.1/data/tmp/foo.c nfs://127.0.0.1/data/tmp/copy-of-foo.c
